sourcesContent:
<template>
  <drag-layout-box ref="box" style="width: 100%">
    <drag-layout-item style="width: 20%; overflow-x: auto;">
      <task-table :headersHeight='headersHeight'></task-table>      
    </drag-layout-item>
    <drag-layout-item style="width: 80%">
      <gantt-table :headersHeight='headersHeight'></gantt-table>
    </drag-layout-item>
  </drag-layout-box>
</template>
<script>
import DragLayoutBox from "./draglayouter/box.vue";
import DragLayoutItem from "./draglayouter/item.vue";
import GanttTable from './Table.vue'
import TaskTable from './task/TaskTable.vue'
import { mutations } from '@/components/gantt/store.js'
export default {
  props : {
    headers: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    taskHeaders: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    headersHeight : {
      type: Number,
      default: 50
    },
  },
	components: { GanttTable, TaskTable, DragLayoutBox, DragLayoutItem },
	watch: {
    headers: function (newVal, oldVal) {
      if (newVal != oldVal) {
        this.setHeaders(newVal)
      }
    },
    taskHeaders: function (newVal, oldVal) {
      if (newVal != oldVal) {
        this.setTaskHeaders(newVal)
      }
    }
  },
	created() {
    this.setHeaders(this.headers)
    this.setTaskHeaders(this.taskHeaders)
  },
	mounted() {
	},
  methods:{
    setHeaders: mutations.setHeaders,
    setTaskHeaders: mutations.setTaskHeaders
  }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
.container {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}
</style>
